IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVISION OF AN ARRAY OF DIVERSIFIED, MEASURABLY HIGH QUALITY SERVICES TO INDIVIDUALS AND FAMILIES IN NEED.
IRS990.MissionDesc: PROVISION OF AN ARRAY OF DIVERSIFIED, MEASURABLY HIGH QUALITY SERVICES TO INDIVIDUALS AND FAMILIES IN NEED.
IRS990.Desc: A DIVERSE ARRAY OF CENTER BASED AND COMMUNITY INTEGRATED AFFIRMATIVE EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITIES FOR INDIVIDUALS WITH DISABILITIES WITH THE GOAL OF ASSISTING EACH INDIVIDUAL TO REACH THE HIGHEST LEVEL OF COMPETITIVE, INTEGRATED EMPLOYMENT POSSIBLE.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: OFFERS COMPREHENSIVE SUBSTANCE ABUSE AND DEPENDENCY SERVICES, INCLUDING EVALUATIONS, TREATMENT, AND PREVENTION. THE GOAL OF SUBSTANCE ABUSE SERVICES IS TO PROVIDE THE NECESSARY SKILLS TO ALLOW PARTICIPANTS TO ENJOY A SUBSTANCE FREE LIFE-STYLE.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: REHABILITATION SERVICE PROGRAMS INCLUDING PROVIDING ADULTS WITH DISABILITIES A VARIETY OF DEVELOPMENTAL, VOCATIONAL, COMMUNITY EMPLOYMENT, AND CASE MANAGEMENT SERVICES.
COMMUNITY SUPPORT PROGRAMS INCLUDING CASE COORDINATION, GREEN HOUSE OPERATION, WORK ACTIVITIES, RESIDENTIAL LIVING, SUPPORTED GROUP LIVING, ETC.
